meta.title: Pragma IT - IT at the service of your business

hero.title: IT at the service of
hero.subtitle: We support SMEs in their digital transformation in a pragmatic and measured way. Because IT is not an end in itself, but a means to achieve your goals.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: The principles that guide our approach
philosophy.card1Title: IT is a means, not an end
philosophy.card1Description: Your IT system must serve your business, not the other way around. We always prioritize ease of use and operational efficiency.
philosophy.card1ExampleText: Rather than a complex €50k system, we prefer a simple €2k solution that genuinely improves your productivity.
philosophy.card2Description: Digital transformation is inevitable. You can either suffer it or benefit from it. We help you anticipate it and turn it into a competitive advantage.
philosophy.card2ExampleText: A planned and accompanied migration avoids hidden costs and production downtime.
philosophy.card3Description: A business leader can no longer ignore security, compliance, and digitalization issues. We train you to make the right decisions.
philosophy.card3ExampleText: Make informed decisions and negotiate as equals with your IT providers.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Complete support for your digital transformation
services.service1Description: Analysis of your digital maturity and definition of a personalized 2-3 year roadmap.
services.service2Description: Progressive implementation of solutions adapted to your context and constraints.
services.service3Description: Training for your teams and support to ensure adoption of new tools.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: An expert team at the service of your digital transformation
team.ceoDescription: Expert in full-stack development and digital strategy. Supports leaders in their technological decisions.
team.ctoDescription: Experienced software architect, specialized in scalable solutions and performance optimization.
team.croDescription: Expert in IT security and risk management. Protects your data and ensures regulatory compliance.
